thumb.title: [TAS] NES Super Mario Bros. "最大スコア" in 18:03.62
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ONA-rQgxt58走者の方々appyLee氏DaSmileKat氏Kzwbz氏Asumeh & Kosmic氏以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6555MTAS originally published on 2025-05-24 Super Mario Bros. is a platforming game for the Nintendo Entertainment System and quite possibly the most influential game ever released for the console. Having been bundled with every brand new NES console, it is the game most people think of when it comes to the NES. Just about every platforming game in the '80s and '90s has taken inspiration from this game one way or another.The efforts of multiple Super Mario Bros. speedrunning veterans have been combined to complete a run that both beats the game and scores so many points that the score counter wraps over. While this may sound simple to achieve, doing so as fast as possible is not as simple as there are more optimal ways to farm points than the simple 1UP Koopa shell trick and places where it can be done quicker without wasting too much time. For further details, you can read the authors' notes here ( https://tasvideos.org/9705S ).
thumb.last_res_body: モノクロというよ... ここでもやるのかｗ 俺たちの時間は一... これは間に合わんよ ビクンビクン タミフル(死語) 落ちる動作の方が... ずーっと入力調整... でもサクサククリ...
